div.p: J.S.S. and K.F.H. had the main responsibility in designing the study and writing the manuscript. J.S.S., M.V., N.K., M.Ky. and A.Ph. prepared the proxy data analyses. J.S.S., S.G., M.Ko. and M.L. prepared the palaeoclimate reconstructions. J.B., J.S.S., A.Pl. and K.H. prepared the age model. J.B., H.R. and A.Pl. provided expertise for the dataâ€“modelling synthesis. All authors participated in analysing the results and contributed comments.
